评论详情: I wear these often,  they are thin in a good way and comfortable to wear all day. Good quality and style 👌
Headbands are super cute. Yes they fell a little cheap. I didn’t have any of the spikes missing like other reviewers. For the price and the fact that you get 2 I would buy them again

评论概述: Dig into the sides after a while
评论详情: Cute, but they dig into the sides of your head after a while.
Bought these for a "Purge" styled photoshoot and they are such great quality!
I love it so much. Just got it today and I'm wearing it. So adorable 😍
Junk. Both arrived broken in numerous places.
Cute, but doesn't actually hold anything back

Perfect! I honestly needed to buy these for a Halloween costume. Not only did it work out and fit my big head perfectly, I now wear it all the time! It's cute and it fits, what more can you ask for? Also, just a side note, if you just so happen to have sensitive ears, if you wear it for a whole day, it will hurt. I never had this problem but don't wear it all day if possible. The fact that it came with two of them instead of just one was the cherry on top!

Not the best quality, BUT for the price it was definitely a steal. You can wear them individually or together to make a bolder statement which is what I did. The spikes are not too big or too small, they are perfect size to me. I’ve had no issues of the spikes falling off or becoming loose, & the headbands stay in the same spot (although I personally add a Bobby pin, just in case). I’ve gotten a few compliments on them as well.
These are so cute. They instantly dress up a simple hairdo and comfortable enough to be worn together or individually.
These are adorable wore them both together to a music festival and got so many compliments
